      com.google.maps.model.DirectionsRoute getRouteSimple​(com.google.maps.model.LatLng originLatLon, com.google.maps.model.LatLng destinationLatLon)
      Return a simple route between the origin and destination parameters, function used to move the bus from a location to another without passengers and to build basis for on-demand route building.

      Return a specifics for a route between the origin and destination parameters with additional details, function used to create either a bus-route, or metro -type route for a vehicle.
      com.google.maps.model.DirectionsResult setRouteWaypointsOnDemand​(int busId, java.lang.String origin, java.lang.String destination, java.lang.String zone)
      Return a specifics for a route between the origin and destination parameters with additional details, function used to create a on-demand route matching the current passengers waiting to be picked up along the way.

      • setRouteWaypoints

        public com.google.maps.model.DirectionsResult setRouteWaypoints​(int busId,
                                                                java.lang.String origin,
                                                                java.lang.String destination,
                                                                java.lang.String waypoints,
                                                                java.lang.String zone)
                                                         throws com.google.maps.errors.ApiException,
                                                                java.lang.InterruptedException,
                                                                java.io.IOException
        Description copied from interface: BusService
        Return a specifics for a route between the origin and destination parameters with additional details, function used to create either a bus-route, or metro -type route for a vehicle. Also sets the route to be used for the specified busId.
        Specified by:
        setRouteWaypoints in interface BusService
        Parameters:
        busId - specifies the ID of the bus you wish to set the route for
        origin - is the starting location for the route, often the initial location of the bus
        destination - is the ending location the bus should reach
        waypoints - details the bus-stops or stations to be added to the route
        Returns:
        returns a com.google.maps.model.DirectionsResult -object, detailing the specifics of the route and additional information. Can return an empty object.
        Throws:
        com.google.maps.errors.ApiException
        java.lang.InterruptedException
        java.io.IOException

      • setRouteWaypointsOnDemand

        public com.google.maps.model.DirectionsResult setRouteWaypointsOnDemand​(int busId,
                                                                        java.lang.String origin,
                                                                        java.lang.String destination,
                                                                        java.lang.String zone)
                                                                 throws com.google.maps.errors.ApiException,
                                                                        java.lang.InterruptedException,
                                                                        java.io.IOException
        Description copied from interface: BusService
        Return a specifics for a route between the origin and destination parameters with additional details, function used to create a on-demand route matching the current passengers waiting to be picked up along the way. Passengers are added to the route with a radius of 1500 meters from each step in the route. Also sets the route to be used for the specified busId.
        Specified by:
        setRouteWaypointsOnDemand in interface BusService
        Parameters:
        busId - specifies the ID of the bus you wish to set the route for
        origin - is the starting location for the route, often the initial location of the bus
        destination - is the ending location the bus should reach
        zone - specifies fleet-control area
        Returns:
        returns a com.google.maps.model.DirectionsResult -object, detailing the specifics of the route and additional information. Can return an empty object.
        Throws:
        com.google.maps.errors.ApiException
        java.lang.InterruptedException
        java.io.IOException
